text: Badola ( ) is an Indic social groups found among degraded Banjaras from _Badoli_ in mid 20th century they tried an attempt to strengthen or up-lifting their lower caste background and allegedly facilitate to become an priestly (Brahmin) class. for instance they still able to consoled among the Schedule classes of Indian states including some part of Pakistan. == Related pages == * Dalit * Brahmin == References ==
title: Badola (caste)
